snippet.title: Portobugia - Trailer - Long version
snippet.description:
This longer version of the trailer shows more features and goes more in the details than the classic trailer!
Portobugia is a survival/management game in a post WWI world where you manage a port and must supply a city for the longest time possible. To do that, you must unload boats, but, be careful, some of them could be infected!

The game is in early access on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1972460/Portobugia/

You can also follow me on Twitter: https://x.com/BoglandStudio
